articles.title: US Woman Dials Parents, Says She's Kidnapped In India. Then A Twist.
articles.description: A 27-year-old US citizen staying here allegedly staged her own kidnapping after she ran out of money in an attempt to extort cash from her parents, police said on Sunday.
